member.name: T:Vendr.Core.Cache.DefaultEntityStatePolicyCache`2
member.summary: Represents the default policy cache.

remarks.para: The default policy cache that caches entities with a 5 minutes sliding expiration.
If options.GetAllCacheAllowZeroCount then a 'zero-count' array is cached when GetAll finds nothing.
If options.GetAllCacheValidateCount then we check against the db when getting many entities.
